title: Dark Visions: The Strange Power, The Possessed, and The Passion
description: FOR USE IN SCHOOLS AND LIBRARIES ONLY. Kaitlyn Fairchild has always felt like an outsider in her small hometown. Her haunting eyes and prophetic drawings have earned her a reputation as a witch. But Kait's not a She's a psychic. Tired of being shunned, Kait accepts an invitation to attend the Zetes Institute, where she can have a fresh start and study with other psychic teens. At the insitute, she learns to hone her telepathic powers-and finds herself torn between two different guys. Then an experiment is revealed to be threatening the teens' sanity, and their lives. And Kaitlyn must decide whom to trust...and whom to love.
author: L.J. Smith
